name: Edwardian Monster Girl Dating Sim - Sylvia Demo
name_original: Edwardian Monster Girl Dating Sim - Sylvia Demo
description:
When you fall through time into another world, you aren't sure how you'll make it back.  Thankfully, some monster ladies find you and willing to help you get back, but not before you have some fun times with them and maybe even fall in love.

A proof of concept created for ViNoWriMo
